20101212013646.000|20101212013647.000|CCO|IS,EROUS.
20101212013647.000|20101212013648.000|CCO|REALLY A WHOPPER HERE IN

20101212013706.000|20101212013707.667|CCO|BLANKETING THE UPPER MIDWEST
20101212013707.667|20101212013709.333|CCO|WITH NEARLY TWO FEET OF SNOW.
20101212013709.333|20101212013711.000|CCO|STRONG WINDS GUSTING AT 50 MILES
20101212013711.000|20101212013712.667|CCO|PER HOUR ARE CREATING
20101212013712.667|20101212013714.333|CCO|BLIZZARD-LIKE CONDITION CONDITIONS FROM

20101212013717.667|20101212013719.333|CCO|ARE TRYING TO STAY AHEAD OF THE

20101212013726.714|20101212013728.143|CCO|>> Reporter: IT'S COMPLETE

20101212013731.000|20101212013733.000|CCO|PLOWS OFF THE STREETS AND ARE
20101212013733.000|20101212013735.000|CCO|WARNING PEOPLE TO STAY INSIDE.

20101212013831.000|20101212013832.667|CCO|>> Mitchell: ALL RIGHT, LIZ
20101212013832.667|20101212013834.333|CCO|COLIN FROM WCCO, UP FOR COMBAT

20101212013836.000|20101212013837.667|CCO|OVERSEAS, AMERICAN STUDENT
20101212013837.667|20101212013839.333|CCO|AMANDA KNOX WAS IN AN ITALIAN
20101212013839.333|20101212013841.000|CCO|COURT TODAY APPEALING HER
20101212013841.000|20101212013842.429|CCO|CONVICTION ON A CHARGE OF
20101212013842.429|20101212013843.857|CCO|MURDERING HER BRITISH ROOMMATE.
20101212013843.857|20101212013845.286|CCO|ALAN PIZZEY WAS IN THE COURTROOM
20101212013845.286|20101212013846.714|CCO|IN THE CENTRAL ITALIAN CITY OF
20101212013846.714|20101212013848.143|CCO|PERUGIA.
20101212013848.143|20101212013849.571|CCO|>> Reporter: AMANDA KNOX USED
20101212013849.571|20101212013851.000|CCO|THE FIRST FULL DAY OF THE APPEAL
20101212013851.000|20101212013853.500|CCO|TO MAKE AN EMOTIONAL PLEA FOR
20101212013853.500|20101212013856.000|CCO|HERSELF AND HER FORMER BOYFRIEND
20101212013856.000|20101212013858.500|CCO|BOYFRIEND.
20101212013858.500|20101212013901.000|CCO|"WE ARE INNOCENT" SHE SAID IN
20101212013901.000|20101212013903.000|CCO|ITALIAN, "AND DESERVE TO LIVE
20101212013903.000|20101212013905.000|CCO|OUR LIVES FREE."
20101212013905.000|20101212013907.000|CCO|KNOX SAID SHE AND RAFFAELE
20101212013907.000|20101212013909.000|CCO|SOLLECITO WERE VICTIMS OF AN
20101212013909.000|20101212013911.000|CCO|ENORMOUS MISTAKE.
20101212013911.000|20101212013913.000|CCO|AND SHE REACHED OUT TEARFULLY TO
20101212013913.000|20101212013915.000|CCO|THE FAMILY OF THE VICTIM,
20101212013915.000|20101212013917.000|CCO|BRITISH STUDENT MEREDITH
20101212013917.000|20101212013919.000|CCO|KERCHER, WHO WAS FOUND STABBED
